text: Ashley Alexander Mallett (13 July 1945 â€“ 29 October 2021) was an Australian cricketer. He played in 38 Tests and 9 One Day Internationals between 1968 and 1980. He played for South Australia cricket team from 1967 to 1981. Mallett died from cancer on 29 October 2021 at the age of 76 in Adelaide. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian cricketers Category:Cancer deaths in Australia Category:Cricketers from Sydney
title: Ashley Mallett
